duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for all payroll and benefits-related operations.
Create journal entries and reconcile missed punches for hourly employees.
Assist employees with their payroll and benefits inquiries, ensuring comfort discussing confidential and sometimes sensitive topics.
Collaborate with HR to process maternity leaves, retirement calculations, worker's compensation, and unemployment calculations.

education_certification.credential: 2-3 years of previous payroll experience with UKG/Ulti-Pro software, and experience with ADP
